lines.text: You heel! Can't even pay a hotel bill! In debt up to your ears, and it's horses! Horses every second you're awake! Horses, horses, horses!

[angrily]
I've been "taking 10" since I've known you watching you fight your way to the bottom!

[unperturbed]
I don't fight, Baby. I'm a lover!

[after auditioning a song]
How'd you like it, sir?
Um. Wouldn't hiss and wouldn't cheer.
